section1.title: Introduction
section1.description: To get a better sense of how React and CSS works, it's recommended to start with this course and after the Module 0, and then shift to The Joy of React. I’ll go with this, since it will help me to develop the notion of why, what and how does CSS and React dance together.

description.paragraph1: Most learning experiences are based on following instructions and replication (most courses out there).
description.paragraph2: However, there is now evidence that <link1>error correction</link1> and a <link2>growth mindset</link2> are ways to invite learning from mistakes and understanding where they came from.
description.paragraph3: <link> Blocking vs Interleaving </link> learning, describe how blocking your attention for a specific time and then shifting to another (relevant) topic is a way for your brain to develop the neuronal path to access information and see how they relate to each other.
